entry.source: Congratulations on besting all of my{F801}difficult Training Battles so far.{F801}Here is this Training Battle's goal:{F801}{F804,5}Defeat a group of enemies with superior{F801}defensive capabilities within four{F801}turns!{F804,0}{F801}Overcome this mission to further hone your skills.{F801}
